name: botmilu
description: Mil Novedades Supabase Bot - Synchronization and AI Agents

scripts.test:chat: bash -c 'source .env && curl -i -X POST "https://lmn.server.neuraz.io/functions/v1/chat-agente" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CHAT_API_KEY}" -d "{\"text\": \"Hola, ¿qué ofertas tienen?\"}"'
scripts.test:chat:gemini: bash -c 'source .env && curl -i -X POST "https://lmn.server.neuraz.io/functions/v1/chat-agente" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer ${CHAT_API_KEY}" -d "{\"text\": \"Hola, recomiéndame algo para la oficina\", \"agente_id\": 3}"'
